title: rustbuild: rustc_codegen_llvm is recompiled when any rustc crate is changed

labels.name: I-compiletime
labels.description: Problems and improvements with respect to compile times.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
## STR

This also occurs with `keep-stage0` etc.

## Expected result

Changing `librustc_typeck` requires only the reverse dependencies of `librustc_typeck` to be recompiled.

## Actual result

`librustc_codegen_llvm` is also recompiled. As you can see, this takes twice as much as compiling the reverse dependencies of `librustc_typeck` alone, leading to compilation being 3x slower.
